ISSUE.TITLE: Change the default editor of Markdown Field to Multi-line
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug In a markdown field, if a user hits "Enter" button on their keyboard, the form get submitted instead of adding a new line. ### To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Created a content type 2. add a Markdown field with standard editor 3. Create a new content item of that content type 4. focus the field input and click "enter" ### Expected behavior When "Enter" in clicked, I expect a new line to be inserted instead of form submitting.
